kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
